description: As a open source gamer concerned with security and privacy, I appreciate HyperPlay's game launcher. This combines all of my games from GoG and Epic as well as new crypto games.

First off love the UI/UX design it looks so good however, I'm not really into crypto therefore it's quite annoying that I boot it up and get a prompt to login to metamask/cryptowallet and i just cant be arsed with those so... other than that it seems quite reliable dont know about in comparison to heroic etc for me it worked far better than Rare.

Personally I would recommend it,however if your not that in to crypto etc it might get Annoying.

Note to Dev('s):
Firstly,And I get this launcher is based on crypto etc can ya just add an option to disable the login to metamask popups,They're just unnecessary I mean you could just have it on the manage accounts screen.

Secondly,I dont know if this is a problem with flatpak or firefox etc but clicking sign in with Xbox on the epic login page doesnt popup a sign in window or oate so it just makes it a bit figity to login...

Thirdly,And I dont know if this is just a problem with legendary but I get logged out of epic all the time similar thing happened with heroic etc

To Leave on a good note I did love how simple and easy it was to manage basically everything to do with wine,
summary: great! With a few minor issues..
